## PunctualLight.viewProjMatrix property

View-projection matrix of the light

**Signature:**

```typescript
/** @override */
get viewProjMatrix(): Matrix4x4;

set viewProjMatrix(mat: Matrix4x4);
```

## Remarks

The view-projection matrix of the light is used to transform a point from the world space to the clip space of the light view
